Package plugins

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Digging
    This tool removes creek sinks by digging a flowpath to a lower located cell.
    Distributions
    This tool can be used to calculate the distribution of the grid values in the input grid.
    DownslopeIndex_Radius
    This tool can be used to calculate the downslope index described by Hjerdt et al.
    ElevAboveCreek
    This tool can be used to calculate the elevation of each grid cell in a raster above the nearest stream cell, measured along the downslope flowpath.
    ExtractValuesAtXYCoords
    This tool can be used to extract grid values at specified XY-coordinates.
    FlowAccumMDInf
    This tool is used to generate a flow accumulation grid (i.e., contributing area) using the MDInf algorithm (Seibert and McGlynn, 2007).
    MedianUpstreamArea
    This tool computes for each stream cell the median value of the upslope areas of all cells that are located upstream (McGlynn et al., 2003).
    SIDE_MDInf
    This tool is used to compute the side separated contributions to a stream (Grabs et al., 2010) using the MDInf algorithm (Seibert and McGlynn, 2007).
    StreamHeadsMDInf
    This tool is used to generate a streamheads grid by applying the MDInf algorithm (Seibert and McGlynn, 2007) and using a threshold value for stream initiation.
